Name: Daily Moisture (2 fl. oz.)
Intro: SkinCeuticals Daily Moisture works to hydrate and nourish skin while reducing the appearance of enlarged pores. Formulated with nutrient-rich algae extracts and a blend of botanical extracts, this daily moisturizer protects skin and leaves it feeling soft and smooth without any greasy residue. Made for oily, combination and normal skin types, this moisturizer helps to balance oil production while providing the optimal amount of moisture to refine pores.
Key_Ingredients:
Algae Extracts: unique blend of red and brown sea algae extracts that nourish and hydrate skin
Botanical Extracts (Burnet, Cinnamon, Ginger, Horsetail, Thyme, Licorice, and Nettle): work synergistically to restore moisture and help minimize the appearance of pores
Key_Benefits:
Restores and maintains moisture
Formulated with botanical extracts to help reduce the appearance of pore size
Protects skin from environmental damage
Leaves skin with a smooth, non-greasy finish
Ideal for normal to oily skin
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness and Dehydration, Free Radical Damage, Acne, Large Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Whiteheads
Ideal_for_skintype: Acne-Prone Skin, Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Mature Skin

Intro: SkinMedica Lytera 2.0 Pigment Correcting Serum addresses the appearance of stubborn discoloration, making even skin tones possible for all skin types. Powered by niacinamide and tetrapeptide-30, this skin brightening formula prevents the appearance of new spots while a marine extract blend supports a healthy skin barrier.
Key_Ingredients:
Tranexamic Acid: helps correct the appearance of hyperpigmentation
Phenylethyl Resorcinol: helps support melanin balance to correct the appearance of hyperpigmentation
Niacinamide & Tetrapeptide-30: helps prevent the appearance of new spots while visibly balancing the appearance of your skin tone
Marine Extract Blend: helps to correct and prevent the appearance of hyperpigmentation while supporting a healthy skin barrier
Phytic Acid: enhances skin texture and promotes even-looking skin
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin

Intro: SkinCeuticals' Discoloration Defense is clinically proven to reduce the appearance of dark spots and discoloration on the face. Powered by kojic acid, tranexamic acid and vitamin B3, this advanced formula is a hydroquinone-free skin brightening serum.
Key_Ingredients:
3% Tranexamic Acid: minimizes the recurrence of discoloration and stubborn brown patches with continued use
1% Kojic Acid: naturally produced by certain fungi, kojic acid helps improve skin brightness
5% Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): a water-soluble vitamin that has been shown to help reduce the appearance of skin discoloration
5% HEPES: a synthetically-derived acid that activates natural enzymes in skin to help break the bonds that bind dead skin cells to the surface for even exfoliation
Key_Benefits:
Features a synergistic blend of anti-discoloration ingredients to reduce the appearance of skin discoloration, improve brightness, and minimize the reoccurrence of discoloration (with continued use)
60% average improvement in the appearance of stubborn brown patches
Paraben-free, fragrance-free, silicone-free, gluten-free, and hydroquinone-free
Ideal at-home complement to professional skin discoloration treatments, such as chemical peels or non-ablative laser; always consult with a physician for individual regimen recommendations
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Hyperpigmentation, Acne, Sun Damage, Scars, Dark Spots, Melasma, Acne Scars
Ideal_for_skintype: Mature Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Sensitive Skin, Normal Skin, Combination Skin, Dry Skin, Oily Skin

I have melasma on my cheeks, forehead, upper lip and bridge of nose. I used this serum on just the dark spots for several weeks, at twice a day. I thought they seemed to get lighter at first, but then I began to notice that they were actually becoming darker!! I stopped using this serum at that moment and as scared to use it again. It seems as though everything I use on my melasma makes it worse, except for Vitamin C. I have used lactic acid, glycolic acid, retin-a, licorice root extract, niacinamide, kojic acid, mulberry extract, alpha arbutin and even bearberry leaf ectract. The only thing that seems to be lightening it is azelaic acid. So, instead of stressing my skin out, I'm focusing on thickening my outer most layer of the skin, as there is a lot of research that found that people who suffer from melasma have a thin stratum corneum , which is the outer most layer of of the skin. So, I moisturize, moisturize and moisturize. Then I use the azelaic acid once a day too, sometimes every other day. No more ingredients that seem to exfoliate the skin away and weaken the stratum corneum... Intro: PCA Skin Pigment Gel diminishes hyperpigmentation and prevents future damage to encourage an even skin tone. The combination of hydroquinone and AHAs help refine and improve your complexion over time. Lactic acid gently exfoliates dead skin cells while potent antioxidants neutralize free radicals to protect your skin from premature aging.
Ideal_for_concern: Combination Skin, Normal Skin
Ideal_for_skintype: Paraben-Free, Fragrance-Free

Intro:
Rejuvenate your complexion while you slumber with the PCA Skin Intensive Brightening Treatment: 0.5% Pure Retinol Night. Working with your body's natural renewal process, this potent treatment delivers pure, potent ingredients deep within your skin to promote a clear, radiant expression. Using a patented OmniSome delivery system, retinol is absorbed into your skin.

The cocktail of vitamins and antioxidants promotes radiance from within while correcting environmental damage and discoloration on the surface of your skin.

Key Ingredients and Benefits:
Key_Ingredients:
Retinol: stimulates cell turnover and renewal to smooth and soften skin
Resveratrol: a potent antioxidant that encourages a bright, even skin tone
Niacinamide: reduces excess oil production and lightens discoloration to brighten skin
Hexylresorcinol: reduces inflammation and promotes an even skin tone
Ideal_for_concern: Free Radical Damage, Hyperpigmentation, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin

Name: Vitamin B3 Brightening Serum (1 fl. oz.)
Intro:
Safely brighten up oily, dry, combination and normal skin with Vitamin B3 Brightening Serum from PCA Skin. Crafted with a powerful formula infused with antioxidants and green tea, this gel-like dark spot corrector works to reduce fine lines, hyperpigmentation, sun damage, dryness, dehydration and redness in a short amount of time. This product is sulfate and phthalate-free.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Niacinamide: a potent, yet calming antioxidant that delivers multiple important benefits to the skin; it helps to reduce transepidermal water loss (TEWL) and improve barrier function for healthy, bright skin
Glycerin: a humectant and emollient that helps hydrate the skin
Mulberry Extract, Green Tea Extract, and Oligopeptide-51: an advanced ingredient blend that decreases the production of unwanted pigment to brighten skin and produce a clear, even complexion
Plankton Extract: an advanced ingredient derived from a biotechnologically balanced and standardized pool of microalgae actives that have been carefully selected and encapsulated in liposomes to brighten and even skin tone while dramatically reducing dark spots and discoloration
Key_Benefits:
Reduces the appearance of dark spots and discoloration
Leaves the complexion even and bright
Increases skin moisture and hydration
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness and Dehydration, Hyperpigmentation, Redness, Sun Damage, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin

Name: C-ESTA Face Serum (1 fl. oz.)
Intro: Brighten and rejuvenate your skin with Jan Marini's C-ESTA Face Serum. Containing DAE Complex and vitamin C, the serum is a readily absorbed liquid anti-aging treatment that enables dramatic revitalization for a smoother and more youthful-looking complexion. Name: GOOD GENES All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment (1.7 oz.)
Intro:
Achieve smoother and more radiant-looking skin with Sunday Riley Good Genes All-In-One Lactic Acid Treatment. Gentle enough for various skin types, this anti-aging treatment is formulated with purified grade lactic acid that works to clear skin and produce natural collagen. Ingredients like licorice, lemongrass and aloe help you achieve an even complexion while reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. 

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
High Potency, Purified Grade Lactic Acid (5%): plumps lines and exfoliates dead skin cells to reveal smoother, clearer and more youthful-looking skin
Licorice: naturally brightens the appearance of hyperpigmentation.
Lemongrass: boosts skin radiance
Aloe: soothes and refreshes skin
Key_Benefits:
100% of women said their skin looked and felt significantly smoother and more radiant, with visibly reduced lines and wrinkles after application*. 
100% of women said this was the most effective skin-plumping product they have ever used and would definitely recommend this product to a friend*.
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Sun Damage, Large Pores, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin
preference: Sulfate-Free, Gluten-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Paraben-Free, Vegan, Natural, Fragrance-Free

Name: C E Ferulic (1 fl. oz.)
Intro:
SkinCeuticals' C E Ferulic features a synergistic antioxidant combination of ferulic acid and pure vitamin C and E to enhance your skin's protection against environmental damage caused by free radicals. In addition to antioxidant protective benefits, this formula improves signs of aging and photodamage to reduce the appearance of lines and wrinkles while firming and brightening your complexion. Lastly, this powerful formula helps neutralize free radicals induced by UVA/UVB, infrared radiation (IRA) and ozone pollution (O3).

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
15% Pure Vitamin C (L-Ascorbic Acid): provides visible anti-aging benefits, brightens skin and helps protect against oxidative stress
1% Vitamin E (Alpha Tocopherol): this pure form of vitamin E neutralizes free radicals and replenishes skin lipids
0.5% Ferulic Acid: a plant-based antioxidant, ferulic acid neutralizes free radicals and enhances the antioxidant benefits and stability of vitamins C and E
Key_Benefits:
Provides advanced environmental protection from skin-damaging free radicals caused by sun and pollution
Improves the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and loss of firmness
Evens and brightens skin tone
Once absorbed, this vitamin C serum can remain effective for 72 hours
Paraben-free and ideal for normal, dry, and sensitive skin types
Tested suitable for use post-laser; Always consult with a physician for individual post-procedure care
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Sun Damage, Free Radical Damage, Dryness and Dehydration, Hyperpigmentation, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Mature Skin
preference: Non-Comedogenic, Clean, Phthalate-Free, Fragrance-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free

Name: Professional-C Serum 20% (1 fl. oz.)
Intro: Obagi Professional-C Serum 20% infuses your skin with L-ascorbic acid, the only form of vitamin C suitable for topical application. Designed to penetrate deep into your skin, this vitamin C serum provides effective antioxidant protection from UV damage as it brightens away hyperpigmentation and encourages the growth of collagen and elastin fibers. Hyaluronic acid binds moisture to your skin to prevent dryness.
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Sun Damage, Free Radical Damage
Ideal_for_skintype: Acne-Prone Skin, Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Mature Skin

Name: Environmental Shield Rapid Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Serum (1 fl. oz.)
Intro: Murad Environmental Shield Rapid Age Spot and Pigment Lightening Serum diminishes the appearance of hyperpigmentation, sun damage and dark spots to promote a brighter complexion and repair the visible signs of aging. Hydroquinone fades existing discoloration while glycolic acid exfoliates dead skin cells to minimize fine lines and wrinkles. Botanical extracts calm and soothe redness and inflammation.
Ideal_for_concern: Free Radical Damage, Redness, Hyperpigmentation, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal Skin, Mature Skin, Sensitive Skin, Combination Skin, Dry Skin, Oily Skin, Acne-Prone Skin

If I use it for too long continuously tho my skin gets angry, so I try to use it for a couple weeks & then take a couple weeks off before picking it up again. USE AN SPF WITH THIS! Name: Active Serum (1 fl. oz.)
Intro: iS Clinical Active Serum provides anti-aging, anti-acne and brightening benefits. Clinically-proven to provide both instant and long-term results, this face serum smooths away fine lines and wrinkles while softening the skin's texture. It reduces the appearance of hyperpigmentation, redness and acne, leading to a clearer and healthier-looking complexion.
Ideal_for_concern: Redness, Hyperpigmentation, Free Radical Damage, Acne, Loss of Firmness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Whiteheads, Blackheads
Ideal_for_skintype: Combination Skin, Mature Skin, Oily Skin, Acne-Prone Skin
preference: Sulfate-Free, Clean, Phthalate-Free, Dermatologist Approved, Paraben-Free

Name: AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (6.75 fl. oz.)
Intro:
We love the Murad AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser because it blends alpha and beta hydroxy acids to deeply clean your pores without causing irritation. Plus, the natural fruit acids promote clarity and a more youthful expression. Developed by dermatologists, this creamy cleanser loosens dull and dead skin cell buildup to resurface your complexion. The result? Brighter, smoother skin with an even tone and reduced line and wrinkle depth.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Salicylic, Lactic and Glycolic Acids: promote natural cell turnover to reveal smoother, softer, brighter skin
Jojoba Beads: buff away dull, dead skin cells
Sodium PCA: prevents skin from drying out
Ideal_for_concern: Milia, Free Radical Damage, Hyperpigmentation, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin, Sensitive Skin, Combination Skin, Dry Skin, Oily Skin

Name: AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser (6 fl. oz.)
Intro: SkinMedica's AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser combines alpha and beta hydroxy acids to remove dead cells and other impurities from your skin to enhance a smoother and brighter complexion. Round soft jojoba spheres provide gentle exfoliating action while lavender extract tones and soothes inflammation. Mildly astringent citrus oils minimize large pores for a radiant and refreshed appearance.
Key_Ingredients:
Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Citric Acid, and Malic Acid: each is a natural, alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) derived from bilberry extract, sugar cane extract, sugar maple extract, and citrus extracts that provide mild exfoliation to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles and enhance skin texture
Jojoba Oil: round soft jojoba spheres gently exfoliate minimizing irritation to skin
Salicylic Acid: a beta-hydroxy acid (BHA) that helps exfoliate the skin
Key_Benefits:
Improves the appearance of skin texture, tone, and smoothness
Thoroughly cleanses and gently exfoliates the skin
Ideal for all skin types
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Large Pores, Acne, Hyperpigmentation, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Acne-Prone Skin, Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Mature Skin

Name: Cleansing Complex (6 fl. oz.)
Intro: iS Clinical Cleansing Complex retextures your skin to give you a smooth, blemish-free complexion. White willow bark exfoliates and breaks up pore-clogging oil to boost cell turnover and tighten the appearance of your pores. Antioxidants derived from chamomile and centella asiatica heal skin damage and prevent free radicals from wreaking havoc on your complexion. This resurfacing gel wash lathers to remove makeup and assist in shaving.
Ideal_for_concern: Oiliness, Hyperpigmentation, Rosacea, Acne, Large Pores, Free Radical Damage
Ideal_for_skintype: Combination Skin, Mature Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Sensitive Skin, Normal Skin, Dry Skin, Oily Skin

Name: Brightening Cleanser (4.2 fl. oz.)
Intro: Indie Lee's Brightening Cleanser gently removes dirt, excess oil and other impurities from your skin to leave it feeling soft and refreshed. With its antioxidant-rich formula, this facial cleanser imparts a light fruity scent while hydrating your complexion and helping to strengthen skin. Its non-irritating formula may be used as an exfoliating mask when left to sit for 5-10 minutes, or used with an electronic cleansing brush.
Key_Ingredients:
Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein: improves moisture and minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
Lycopene: powerful antioxidant derived from the tomato that fends off environmental aggressors
Strawberry Seed Oil: rich in salicylic acid and vitamins A, B, C, and E, boosts elasticity and radiance
Key_Benefits:
Gently removes impurities
Promotes a brighter complexion
Hydrates and firms
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Dryness and Dehydration, Oiliness
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin
preference: Phthalate-Free, Sulfate-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Paraben-Free, Natural

Name: Stone Crop Gel Wash (4.2 fl. oz.)
Intro: Eminence Organic Skin Care's Stone Crop Gel Wash hydrates and cleanses your skin in one multitasking step. This nourishing face wash includes the unique ingredient stone crop pulp that works to calm and remove dehydrated layers of cells from the surface of your skin. It promotes a smoother and softer skin texture. Nut-free.
Key_Ingredients:
Stone Crop: hydrating and nourishing for uneven skin tones
Soap Base (Free Of Sodium Lauryl Sulphate): cleanses and softens
Shea Butter: calming and restorative agent
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Hypersensitive Skin, Free Radical Damage
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin
preference: Phthalate-Free, Paraben-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Certified Organic, Gluten-Free, Sulfate-Free, Vegan, Natural

Name: Stone Crop Cleansing Oil (5 fl. oz.)
Intro:
Elevate your daily skin care routine with Eminence Organics Stone Crop Cleansing Oil. Enriched with nourishing ingredients like stone crop, microgreens, jojoba and sunflower oil, this cleansing oil works effectively to wash away oil and dirt from you skin, revealing a more balanced complexion. Soy- and nut-free.

Key Benefits:
Key_Ingredients:
Stone Crop: Hydrating and moisturizing; brightens and revitalizes the look of the skin; reduces the appearance of redness
Detoxifying Microgreens Complex (Broccoli, Radish and Clover sprouts, and Detoxophane from Swiss cress sprouts): A potent blend of microgreens that protects against the drying effects of environmental stressors and reduces the signs of aging for brighter, younger looking skin
Sunflower Oil: Rich in Vitamins A, D and E; protects and soothes dry skin
Jojoba Oil: Hydrating oil easily absorbed into the skin
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Redness, Sun Damage, Hyperpigmentation, Rosacea, Free Radical Damage, Large Pores, Loss of Firmness, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Gluten-Free, Phthalate-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Certified Organic, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Vegan, Natural

Name: Vitamin C Face Wash (1.69 fl. oz.)
Intro: Joanna Vargas Vitamin C Face Wash blends stimulating botanical extracts and oils to remove impurities as it illuminates your skin. Antioxidant-rich acai and goji berry extracts fight free-radical damage while hyaluronic acid plumps your skin with lightweight moisture. Galactoarabinan extract boosts cell turnover as citrus-derived vitamin C protects collagen and elastin fibers and diminishes hyperpigmentation.
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Free Radical Damage
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Dry Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Combination Skin, Mature Skin, Oily Skin

Name: Mild Cream Cleanser (6.7 fl. oz.)
Intro: Glytone's Mild Cream Cleanser is formulated with a blend of conditioners, moisturizers and non-irritating surfactants to gently and thoroughly cleanse and lubricate dry skin without causing irritation. A concentration of 3.4% Free Acid Value glycolic acid exfoliates dead skin cells to minimize fine lines, wrinkles and hyperpigmentation, leaving the skin looking brighter and feeling smoother.
Key_Ingredients: Glycolic Acid (3.4 PFAV™): exfoliates dead skin cells and moisturizes the skin.
Key_Benefits:
Thoroughly cleanses, exfoliates, removes makeup and unclogs pores leaving skin soft, smooth and revitalized.
A rich, lathering formula that leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and clean.
Used as part of an anti-aging skincare regimen.
Ideal_for_concern: Free Radical Damage, Hyperpigmentation, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Sensitive Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin, Normal Skin, Combination Skin, Dry Skin, Oily Skin

Name: Purity Clean (5 fl. oz.)
Intro:
Few things are as frustrating as a problematic complexion. Having an oily or uneven texture, hyperpigmentation or a breakout can make you feel less than secure, and it seems like it always happens right when you need your confidence the most. CosMedix Purity Clean gently cleanses your skin while its potent formula sweeps away dead skin cells, excess sebum, make-up buildup and other impurities. Its refreshing and natural scent awakens your senses and invigorates your spirit while cooling aloe soothes and calms inflammation. Essential oils and antioxidants deliver moisture and fight free-radical damage to minimize the signs of aging. With regular use, your complexion looks clear and you feel ready for anything, anytime.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Tea Tree Oil: balances and clarifies skin
Peppermint Essential Oil: refreshes as it cools and calms the skin
Ideal_for_concern: Oiliness, Hyperpigmentation, Acne, Large Pores, Free Radical Damage, Whiteheads, Cystic Acne, Blackheads
Ideal_for_skintype: Acne-Prone Skin, Oily Skin, Combination Skin, Sensitive Skin
preference: Paraben-Free, Dermatologist Approved, Sulfate-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Clean

Name: Glycolic Renewal Gel Cleanser (5 fl. oz.)
Intro:
Glycolic Renewal Gel Cleanser from SkinCeuticals powerfully cleanses your skin removing impurities, dirt, oil, and long-wearing makeup without stripping the skin of moisture. Formulated with glycolic and phytic acids, this gel cleanser gently dissolves dead skin cells resulting in a brighter, smoother and clearer complexion. Refreshing aloe barbadensis leaf extract moisturizes and soothes the skin.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
8% Glycolic Acid: derived from sugar cane, this powerful fruit acid helps stimulate skin’s natural exfoliation process and minimizes the buildup of dead skin cells, resulting improvement in the appearance of skin texture, tone, and a brighter complexion
1% Phytic Acid: naturally present in legumes and seeds, this potent ingredient provides dual-action exfoliation and skin brightening effects. It helps to inhibit the impact of skin aggressors that can cause dullness, promoting skin clarity and glow
2% Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract: enriches the skin's barrier to moisturize, refresh, and soothe skin
Key_Benefits:
Promotes cellular turnover
Removes impurities, long-wearing makeup
Non-comedogenic; paraben, synthetic-fragrance,dye, alcohol, and soap-free
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Sun Damage, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Paraben-Free, Non-Comedogenic

Name: C-ESTA Cleansing Gel (8 oz.)
Intro: C-ESTA Cleansing Gel is a luxurious lathering cleanser that encourages a noticeably softer, smoother, more refined skin texture, suitable for any skin type, from oily to dry to extremely sensitive. Formulated with lipid soluble vitamin C and Jan Marini's DAE Complex, C-ESTA Cleansing Gel is a potent skin conditioner that prepares the skin for the application of other C-ESTA products. It is also ideal for use after chemical peels, CO2 Laser resurfacing or when cleansers containing glycolic acid may not be appropriate, removing dirt and impurities without irritation.
Ideal_for_concern: Free Radical Damage, Large Pores, Hyperpigmentation, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Acne-Prone Skin, Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Mature Skin

Name: Hydrate Luxe (1.7 oz.)
Intro:
We know that our body and mind requires a good night's sleep to restore energy, but did you know that sleep is essential to our skin, too? Obagi Hydrate Luxe is designed to work in tandem with your natural nightly function of your skin to hydrate and replenish your complexion. Even if you aren't able to get all 8 hours of sleep, you'll awake feeling refreshed with skin that is more radiant, more supple and softer. Sustained use will continue the cycle of replenishment, further improving the overall appearance and condition of your skin.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Shea Butter: softens and moisturizes skin
Biomimetic Peptides: designed to mimic naturally occurring peptides, which form a barrier on your skin to capture moisture and support cell repair processes
Hydromanil: helps the skin to retain moisture
Ideal_for_concern: Clean
Ideal_for_skintype: Peptides, Shea Butter

Name: Dermal Repair Cream (1.7 oz.)
Intro:
Because a truly all-encompassing hydration treatment takes some extra tender loving care, SkinMedica Dermal Repair Cream is one skin staple that offers anti-aging and moisturizing benefits in spades. Specially crafted to deliver optimal results during daily use, it instantly replenishes your skin with the necessary moisture it needs. All at once helping to repair sun-damaged skin and reduce age spots, this dense cream doesn't fall short on skin-loving antioxidants and vitamins.

Deeply penetrating the surface of your skin with vitamins C and E, while retinol, hyaluronic acid and omega-3 fatty acids work in synergy to reverse the signs of time, this moisturizing treatment is just the trick your skin-care regimen's been lacking. Offering the same benefits as a handful of essentials yet delivering it in one, potent cream, it's bound to become a key player in your day-to-day rotation.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Vitamin C: helps even skin tone and impart a brighter complexion
Vitamin E: repels free radicals; helps visibly smooth over wrinkles and fine lines
Hyaluronic Acid: instantly plumps skin for a visibly smoother surface; retains water in skin
Omega-3 Fatty Acids: diminishes signs of aging; promotes healthy skin cell production
Ideal_for_concern: Sun Damage, Free Radical Damage, Dryness and Dehydration
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Normal Skin

Based on the reviews & size of the sample I decided to use the product as a targeted treatment for these specific problem areas - and I am so glad I did! At first I applied my nightly serum, the Dermal Repair Cream to problem areas, then followed lightly with an all over moisturizer & my Avene Thermal Water spray. The next day there was an obvious difference in the visibility of fine lines. After day 1 I combined Dermal Repair with NeoStrata Cellular Restoration & the results were even more impressive. By the end of 2 weeks the lines were completely gone. I have not purchased the full size because of the price, but definitely will be soon because the results were unfortunately (of course) not permanent. I have avoided all fillers, injections, etc to this point & believe I can continue to do so with this product. Name: Emollience (2 fl. oz.)
Intro: SkinCeuticals' Emollience regulates dry skin with a blend of exclusive lipids and marine extracts. Suitable for daily use, this lightweight formula absorbs quickly to deliver nourishing ingredients for a more youthful-looking appearance. Mango seed butter rehydrates your complexion, while lavender soothes redness.
Key_Ingredients:
Algae Extracts: three nutrient-rich algae extracts nourish and hydrate skin.
Nourishing Plant Oils: grapeseed, rosehip and macadamia nut oils restore and maintain skin hydration
Essential Oil Blends: a combination of lavender, rosemary, and peppermint oil for a cooling, nourishing feeling
Key_Benefits:
Nourishes and hydrates the skin
Restores and maintains skin moisture levels
Absorbs quickly and evenly
Optimal for high altitudes and cold or dry climates
Ideal for dry or sensitive skin types
Ideal_for_concern: Redness, Dryness and Dehydration, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Mature Skin

Name: Clearskin (1.7 oz.)
Intro: PCA Skin Clear Skin promotes a bright complexion in the morning and at night with a mix of vitamins and calming extracts. Niacinamide maintains moisture retention which, in turn, can help control sebum production and minimize excess oil. Borage seed oil is rich with fatty acids to reduce redness associated with breakouts while cucumber extract purifies and soothes your skin's texture.
Ideal_for_concern: Acne, Redness, Dryness and Dehydration, Large Pores, Free Radical Damage, Milia
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Acne-Prone Skin

Name: Replenish Hydrating Cream (2 oz.)
Intro: SkinMedica's Replenish Hydrating Cream restores moisture levels for skin that is smoother, softer and more balanced. Chamomile-derived bisabolol conditions and calms your complexion, while antioxidant-enriched green tea prevents free radical damage. Vitamin C naturally brightens to restore youthful radiance, as glycerin locks in moisture to ensure a comfortable wear all day long.
Ideal_for_concern: Free Radical Damage, Fine Lines and Wrinkles

Name: Skin Smoothing Cream (1.7 oz.)
Intro: Dermalogica Skin Smoothing Cream hydrates and conditions your skin as it fights the visible signs of premature aging. Botanical extracts of soothing aloe and healing arnica restore suppleness and vitality to overstressed skin. Mallow and cucumber extracts reduce redness as they moisturize. Antioxidant-rich grapeseed oil combines with vitamins A, C and E to reduce fine lines, minimize wrinkles and neutralize free radicals.
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Redness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Normal Skin
preference: Dermatologist Approved, Vegan, Gluten-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free

Name: Resveratrol Lift Night Infusion Cream (1.7 fl. oz.)
Intro:
Resveratrol Lift Night Infusion Cream from Caudalie works to repair surface damage created during the day by boosting our natural reparative cycle while you sleep. Crafted with hyaluronic acid, and resveratrol, this anti-aging night cream rebuilds, restores and resculpts skin to reveal a plumper and radiant complexion. Envelop yourself with the aromatic cocktail of chamomile, poppy, lavender, sage, fresh mint and orange soothe your skin and lull you to sleep. 

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Resveratrol: smoothes the look of wrinkles
Hyaluronic Acid: moisturizes and plumps skin
Grape-Seed Oil: nourishes and regenerates skin
Vinolevure: fortifies skin against environmental aggressors
Key_Benefits:
Smooths fine lines
Anti-wrinkle
Glow-activating
Non-comedogenic
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness and Dehydration, Aging Skin, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Mature Skin

Name: Nutrient Toner (4.4 oz.)
Intro: PCA Skin Nutrient Toner (formerly Nutrient Toner - pHaze 5) features a revitalizing combination of vitamins, enzymes and amino acids to nourish the skin while preparing it for further treatment. It also contains alpha hydroxy acids, formulated to help refine pores and remove superficial dead skin cells, reducing your skin's risk of blemishes and other impurities.
Ideal_for_concern: Large Pores, Loss of Firmness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin

Name: Equalizing Toner (6.8 fl. oz.)
Intro: SkinCeuticals' Equalizing Toner gently evens combination to oily skin types for a clearer complexion. Harnessing the power of botanical extracts, this skin toner reduces redness caused by breakouts, while a fruit acid blend helps exfoliate dead skin cells. Ideal for oily and combination skin types, this formula is free of oil and fragrance.
Key_Ingredients:
Fruit Acid Blend (Glycolic Acid, Citric Acid, Malic Acid, Tartaric Acid & Lactic Acid): works synergistically to gently exfoliate the skin
Botanical Extracts (Witch Hazel, Rosemary, Aloe & Chamomile): soften, soothe, and tone the skin
Key_Benefits:
Helps regulate the pH of the skin
Synthetic fragrance- and alcohol-free
Ideal complement to aesthetic procedures and at-home cosmeceutical use
Ideal_for_concern: Large Pores, Redness, Hyperpigmentation, Acne, Acne Scars
Ideal_for_skintype: Combination Skin, Mature Skin, Sensitive Skin, Normal Skin, Dry Skin, Oily Skin

Name: Multi-Active Toner (8.4 oz.)

Name: Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist (4.2 fl. oz.)
Intro: Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist by Eminence Organic Skin Care deeply hydrates the skin using an energizing blend of coconut water and fragrant neroli oil. Infused with green apple stem cell technology, this face toner leaves skin looking tighter, softer and smoother. Nut-free.
Key_Ingredients:
Neroli Oil: regenerating, refreshing and hydrating; fragrant antiseptic and skin softener
Coconut Milk: moisturizing and nourishing; softens the skin’s appearance
Coconut Water: moisture and pH balancing, toning; infuses the skin with strengthening electrolytes, Vitamin C, calcium, potassium, phosphorus
Natural Retinol Alternative Complex: immediate lifting and tightening agent containing chicory root oligosaccharides and tara tree; collagen boosting, firming and smoothing
PhytoCellTec™ Swiss Green Apple Stem Cells: rejuvenating plant stem cell concentrate; maintains the look of skin’s elasticity and regeneration by strengthening cells and delays the visible signs of aging
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Sun Damage, Hyperpigmentation, Free Radical Damage, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Mature Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Sensitive Skin, Combination Skin, Dry Skin, Normal Skin, Oily Skin
preference: Phthalate-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Certified Organic, Gluten-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Vegan, Natural

Name: Beauty Elixir (3.4 fl. oz.)
Intro:
Caudalie's Beauty Elixir is an ideal solution when you need a quick pick-me-up or a boost of hydration. Enriched with all-natural ingredients, this skin toner evens your complexion, smooths fine lines and visible pores and combats dehydrated skin.

Key Ingredients:
Key_Ingredients:
Grapes: moisturizes
Rose Oil: tones
Rosemary: energizes
Key_Benefits:
Makeup setting spray
Brightens the complexion
Imparts an energizing sensation
Tightens pores
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness and Dehydration, Large Pores, Aging Skin, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Acne-Prone Skin, Oily Skin, Dry Skin, Combination Skin, Normal Skin, Sensitive Skin, Mature Skin

Name: Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist (4.2 fl. oz.)
Intro: Neroli Age Corrective Hydrating Mist by Eminence Organic Skin Care deeply hydrates the skin using an energizing blend of coconut water and fragrant neroli oil. Infused with green apple stem cell technology, this face toner leaves skin looking tighter, softer and smoother. Nut-free.
Key_Ingredients:
Neroli Oil: regenerating, refreshing and hydrating; fragrant antiseptic and skin softener
Coconut Milk: moisturizing and nourishing; softens the skin’s appearance
Coconut Water: moisture and pH balancing, toning; infuses the skin with strengthening electrolytes, Vitamin C, calcium, potassium, phosphorus
Natural Retinol Alternative Complex: immediate lifting and tightening agent containing chicory root oligosaccharides and tara tree; collagen boosting, firming and smoothing
PhytoCellTec™ Swiss Green Apple Stem Cells: rejuvenating plant stem cell concentrate; maintains the look of skin’s elasticity and regeneration by strengthening cells and delays the visible signs of aging
Ideal_for_concern: Aging Skin, Sun Damage, Hyperpigmentation, Free Radical Damage, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Loss of Firmness, Dark Spots
Ideal_for_skintype: Mature Skin, Acne-Prone Skin, Sensitive Skin, Combination Skin, Dry Skin, Normal Skin, Oily Skin
preference: Phthalate-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Certified Organic, Gluten-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Vegan, Natural

Name: CoQ-10 Toner (4.2 fl. oz.)
Intro: Indie Lee's CoQ-10 Toner removes impurities and residue left over from cleansing while balancing levels. Formulated with a soothing blend of aloe, chamomile and cucumber extracts, this alcohol-free formula refreshes skin, as hyaluronic acid plumps and brightens your complexion with lightweight moisture. Coenzyme Q10 diminishes the appearance of fine lines while neutralizing free radicals.
Key_Ingredients:
Aloe, Chamomile, and Cucumber Extracts: soothe and hydrate the skin
Hyaluronic Acid: plumps and enhances clarity
Coenzyme Q10: minimizes the signs of aging and shields against free radicals
Key_Benefits:
Refreshes, tones and brightens
Balances levels
Promotes a youthful appearance
Ideal_for_concern: Hyperpigmentation, Free Radical Damage, Large Pores, Loss of Firmness, Fine Lines and Wrinkles
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry Skin, Normal Skin
preference: Vegan, Phthalate-Free, Certified Cruelty-Free, Sulfate-Free, Paraben-Free, Natural

Name: Cranberry Toner (4.05 oz.)
Intro: Arcona Cranberry Toner infuses skin with antioxidants that leave it smooth and vibrant. A cleanser, toner and moisturizer in one, this skin toner uses phyto-nutrients, vitamins and essential fatty acids to clarify and protect skin against free radicals and other harsh factors.
Ideal_for_concern: Free Radical Damage

Name: Schaf Revitalizing Serum
Intro: This all-in-one powerhouse serum, created for sensitive skin, brightens skin tone and provides skin with lasting hydration.It leaves skin feeling lifted, radiant and smooth. Skin's texture is refined, hydrated, toned, and left with a youthful glow.Vitamin C boosts brightness, Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide renews and restores the surface of skin against moisture loss. Peptides reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.While retinoid (retinol) can smooth wrinkles and encourage rapid cell turnover to make skin look younger, it can also cause redness, stinging, peeling, and itching. Retinol is also sensitive to the sun, which means it's not great to apply during daylight hours. Our serum delivers similar results, but without these aggravating side effects - even for those with sensitive skin.
Key_Ingredients: Ingredients: Deionized Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Propanediol**, Niacinamide, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate**, Glycerin, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Palmitoyl Oligopeptide (and) Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Pisum Sativum Peptide, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose. *organic **ecocert.
Key_Benefits:
Effective and stable skin brightening agent 
Photo-aging prevention and reduces dark spots
Increases collagen synthesis
Excellent anti-oxidation properties
Improves skin's elasticity with anti-wrinkle properties
Enhances barrier function preventing skin from losing water content
Helps discolouration and uneven skin tone
Stimulates microcirculation
Hyaluronic Acid (10%) secures moisture and stimulates a more youthful skin by improving its moisture content
Vitamin C (15%)
Niacinamide renews and restores the surface of skin against moisture loss and dehydration by helping skin improve its natural production of skin-strengthening ceramides. When ceramides become depleted, skin is left vulnerable to all sorts of problems, from persistent patches of dry, flaky skin to increasingly becoming extra-sensitive.
For women and men
For all skin types
Vegan friendly

Name: Restorative Skin Complex with TriHex Technology
Intro: Restorative Skin Complex with TriHex Technology® should be used every day to strengthen skin and combat visible signs of aging on the face.
Key_Ingredients:
TriHex Technology® – A blend of active peptides and key ingredients that works with the skin to clear out damaged elastin and collagen and support the skin’s natural ability to produce new, healthy elastin and collagen.
Phosphatidylserine – Helps support the skin’s ability to maintain healthy collagen levels.
Palmitoyl Depeptide-5 – Aids in maintaining the structural support of the skin.
Acetyl Hexapeptide-38 and L-Ornithine – Supports healthy adipose tissue resulting in more youthful volume.
Phytoene, Phytofluene and Niacinamide – Potent antioxidants that also address pigmentary concerns.
Key_Benefits:
Improves the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.
Helps restore volume to thinning skin.
Works with the skin to clear out damaged elastin and collagen.
Supports the production of new, healthy elastin and collagen.
Helps to improve skin elasticity.
Potent antioxidants help protect the skin from further damage.
Helps even skin tone.
Review:
[{'date': '06/12/2020', 'rating': 5, 'text': 'Amazing product -even after cancer treatments! I recently finished a year of cancer treatments including chemo, chemo-radiation, and surgery. Let’s just say between the treatments, not being able to use most of my skin care regiment (no botox, no retinol, not even antioxidants while on chemo) , and the fatigue (meaning less than optimal self-care)..my skin needed some TLC. I decided to try the Restorative Skin Complex and wow..first off, it’s so gentle (no scent, feels amazing) that my skin had no problem tolerating it. I instantly noticed better hydration and my skin felt great. Over the past couple weeks, my skin tone has improved and the fine lines on my forehead have been reduced, and my skin just appears more plump and healthy. I’m using in conjunction with the restorative eye cream, nectar, and retinol at night. I feel like my skin is starting to look better than ever and I still haven’t done any botox! I can’t wait to see how my skin will look with ongoing use! Will update!!!'}, {'date': '05/01/2020', 'rating': 4, 'text': 'After using for 8 months... I always wait to write a review until I’ve used the product more than a few months. Now that I’m quarantined due to COVID-19, I haven’t had a facial in nearly 2 months and this product has helped hydrate my skin without the help of my esthetician. Name: Evening Primrose + Green Tea Algae Retinol Oil
Intro: This Product Is: a luxurious night time oil
Key_Ingredients: crambe abyssinica (mustard) seed oil limnanthes alba (meadowfoam) seed oil cannabis sativa( hemp) seed oil glycine soja (soybean) seed oil
Key_Benefits: Why We Love It:The Mara Evening Primrose + Green Tea Algae Retinol Oil is a luxurious nighttime oil that will help you to achieve radiantly clear skin. The Algae Retinol Face Oil soaks your skin with powerful algae extracts, 1.2% retinol, and natural sources of vitamin A to rejuvenate and reveal healthy youthful looking skin.This vita-rich superhero serum helps to boost hydration as well as reduce the appearance of fine lines, pores, and uneven texture by drenching your complexion with hemp-derived cannabis oil.  The oil contains the 20 known amino acids and antioxidants from fermented green tea. Phytonutrient powerhouse, brown seaweed and evening primrose, help to plump up the skin’s appearance and lock in moisture for a radiantly clear glow that’s always hydrated and never dry.
Ideal_for_skintype: Good for: all skin types including dry, mature, sensitive, blemish-prone, combination and normal

Intro: gentle enough to use daily, philosophy's gentle exfoliating facial wash cleanses and replenishes skin. philosophy's unique formula helps to polish and scrub away impurities and the buildup of dead skin cells. skin feels clean and hydrated and looks more even-toned.
Key_Benefits: cleansing & make-up removal, pores, skin exfoliation
Review:

I have, for over 20 years, had these tiny cists underneath my eyes. Drs. have told me various things about them: too much fat in the diet, not drinking enough water, etc.

Well about a month ago I started to use this bottle of philosophy microderm exfoliating wash every single day. I had not previously been impressed with the purchase, but thought I should finish the bottle.

Everyday, morning and night I washed my face with it, scrubbing gently with my fingertips.

Well, it's been a month and gradually I have seen my skin change: smaller, much smaller pores and the tiny cists under my eyes are gone!

I have weird skin.. it's usually pretty greasy.. but it gets really dry in the winter.. so I get dry, flaky skin and then later in the day it also gets the added shine (ew). I needed something to exfoliate my skin so I could get the dry skin flakes off, so that when I use moisturizer it actually goes into my skin and doesn't just sit on top of the dead, flaky skin (this looks really bad when I try to put makeup on). Because my skin is naturally oily and gets dried out in the winter, it overcompensates the oil trying to moisturize my skin as the day goes on.. so this was a big issue for me to resolve. This exfoliating wash probably got rid of 90% of the dry skin flakes on my face--usually after I shower I can "wipe off" those flakes with a towel but I didn't have to do that after using this wash. It did the work for me. And now I can finally use my moisturizer and my skin will absorb it and my oils will not have to overcompensate... great product! I bought a smaller ounce version, but will definitely be buying a larger bottle when this one runs out!'}, {'date': 'April 10, 2019', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': 'The best I had pimples and tried all kinds of face washes from $1-$100 dollars not one worked for me my Tia bought me this one and I used it once a day for three months I could not be happier! this is worth every penny'}, {'date': 'October 16, 2018', 'rating': 4.0, 'text': 'Magic Potion! It was wonderful while it lasted"}, {'date': 'March 3, 2015', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': "Awesome Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser for Sensitive Skin I didn't start using this product with the expectation of it being a miracle product, but it turned out to be one for me. I mostly needed something that would help exfoliate my sensitive, acne-prone skin, because the washcloth scrubbing wasn't cutting it. I had a lot of clogged pores on my forehead and chin from dead skin cells that weren't being sloughed off well enough, I decided to try this cleanser out and loved it, especially in the shower. I find that it's very mild, but gets the job done. Just massage it into a damp face for about 60 seconds and then rinse it off. There's no residue and my skin is never irritated.
For moisturization in this very cold, dry winter weather, I use Philosophy's Back to Nourishment moisturizer, which I also love. These two products in combination have made my skin the best it's ever been in my life and I've had some seriously bad skin years."}, {'date': 'February 23, 2018', 'rating': 2.0, 'text': 'Made me break out I’m very fair skinned and never break out. When my face was closely examined before a microdermabrasion at the spa, I was told I have very clean skin."}, {'date': 'June 15, 2012', 'rating': 3.0, 'text': 'Good face wash, bad container I like this face wash, it's the best one I have found. I am a guy, and have sensitive skin. I've never really been in to washing my face, but mainly because I have never found a decent wash that didn't dry out my skin ASAP. I go to the beauty isle at my local grocery store and am overwhelmed. So a couple years ago, I came on amazon to see if I could find a face wash that was recommended. And I found this one. It feels great, doesn't dry my skin out.

Now - for the bad part. The lid on this container gets easily clogged up. It's very annoying. It's just your standard pop-up lid, but it gets jammed up with dried out face wash. It gets to the point where you can't squeeze any out. If you try to squeeze too hard, it "pops" the dried up seal and a bunch comes out. I usually end up unscrewing the lid and trying to get some out that way.

Wish this company would fix the lid - would be a 5 star product!'}, {'date': 'April 23, 2016', 'rating': 1.0, 'text': "Disappointed Disappointed with this product, the beads are so fine and small that I don't think it even exfoliates my face at all and it smells bad"}, {'date': 'August 31, 2016', 'rating': 3.0, 'text': 'Maybe my skin is more sensitive now ! I have sensitive skin , breakouts ,uneven skin tone and open pores .. this product used to solve 60% of the issues before but not this time .'}, {'date': 'September 9, 2016', 'rating': 2.0, 'text': 'Old products? Poor condition This review is only for the product condition. 16oz size arrived today and the bottle is dirty and scuffed up with the text faded in some areas. Looks old and not in good condition. Not happy'}, {'date': 'March 14, 2014', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': "Wonderful facial cleanser and skin exfoliator - gentle for delicate skin. I am very careful with what I put on my skin. I don't think I have used soap, (even the most gentle), on my face since I was 30. I have always used gentle facial cleansers, especially those recommended by my dermatologist. A friend told me she has been using Philosophy Microdelivery Exfoliating Wash for quite some time and she finds the results to be excellent. So, I tried it and have used it daily ever since. The difference between Philosophy and other facial cleansers, is that this is an exfoliating wash. It cleans the skin and also sloughs off old skin cells. Most importantly, it is not too rough on my delicate aging skin. So...good-bye dry flaky skin!

I apply this to my slightly damp face and massage for about 30 seconds...always massage upward. And make sure you rinse thoroughly. It doesn't matter if you use this wash, or another, or soap, always be careful to rinse all residue off before patting dry.

I do use this once a day, usually before I go to bed...and then I moisturize. I wouldn't use it around the delicate eye area though. And if you have a gentle make-up remover, I would use it before applying a dollop of Philosophy Microdelivery Exfoliating Wash.

This product was designed to effectively cleanse the skin while providing resurfacing benefits. This formula is sulfate-free and formulated with ingredients designed to replenish and protect the skin with topical antioxidants as it helps condition the skin and retain its moisture level.

The ingredients are: water (aqua), decyl glucoside, sodium cocoyl apple amino acids, diatomaceous earth, acrylates⁄steareth-20 methacrylate crosspolymer, glycerin, disodium cocoamphodiacetate, borago officinalis seed oil, phytosterols, tocopherol, tocotrienols, oryza sativa (rice) bran wax, panthenol, sodium magnesium silicate, tetrasodium edta, sodium hydroxide, citric acid, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylisothiazolinone.

I highly recommend this for all skin types.
JANA"}, {'date': 'April 21, 2017', 'rating': 3.0, 'text': "New formula is less effective, more irritating Apparently Philosophy recently updated their formula for this, and sadly, it's no longer good for my sensitive skin. I'd been devoted to this exfoliating cleanser for years--it was the perfect balance of scrubby and gentle, and it didn't irritate my skin at all, not even using it every day. The new formula however, is VERY different. The three big things I noticed:

1) A strong fragrance has been added. The fragrance isn't bad, just quite strong, and unfortunately, fragrances most often cause irritation to my skin. I suspect this is the cause of the stinging I now experience with it.
2) It is now more of a bead-style exfoliator, rather than a grainy one. For me, these are dramatically less effective and also more abrasive, making it unpleasant to use. My skin does not feel smooth and clean after using it, as it always had with the old formula. Instead I can still feel build-up in my pores.
3) The wash is now more gel-like. The former formula was more liquid-y, with the small exfoliating grains mixed in well. Now, there are relatively few beads, suspended in a gel-consistency wash.

I will not buy the new formula again. I'm disappointed to have to look for a different product, especially as Philosophy markets this product as being good for sensitive skin. Now, it not only irritates my skin, but also fails to actually exfoliate well."}, {'date': 'February 25, 2018', 'rating': 1.0, 'text': 'Ingredients changed & it’s awful now 😿 Have used & LOVED this product for years! However the bottle I recently purchased at Sephora is a new formula & I hate it. Really strong & fake lemon fragrance, and it has torn my face up after 2 uses, 3 days apart. My lips feel dry, tight & sunburnt 3 days later and my face still feels slightly burnt or irritated. I’ve always been able to use it gently on my lips & it’s never even slightly irritated my skin. Extremely disappointed. I work in a fragrance lab and this new formulation is loaded with chemicals that I use there every day & wouldn’t dream of touching without gloves on. Never even thought to check the ingredients, as it’s been a tried & true favorite for maybe 10 years. Heartbroken & was really hoping to find the original product here.'}, {'date': 'March 13, 2019', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': 'Awesome Daily Exfoliator! I’m a huge fan of Philosophy’s Shampoo/Shower Gel/Bubble Bath in various senses, Renewed Hope in a Jar, and Purity facial wash, so I was expecting amazing results from Microdelivery Facial Wash, and I wasn’t disappointed! I love the smell. It smells clean, while not being too overpowering. A little goes a long way. I dot it around my face and then scrub it in for about a minute. My face immediately feels clean, smooth is soft to touch and not greasy! It’s gentle! I’ve been using it for two years now, and my face is smooth, glowing, hydrated, my pores are smaller and reddish skin is improved! Before I started using it my face was dry and I occasionally got acne. Those problems disappeared! I normally buy it in value sets. I use it every morning and have no plans to stop!'}, {'date': 'July 6, 2016', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': "Super fine grain for sensitive skin My skin can be dry and flaky on my cheeks and jawline, but it's also sensitive so coarse scrubs irritate my skin. This exfoliating wash has a super fine grain that gently scrubs away dead skin. I lightly massage it into my skin for about a minute, focusing on my flaky areas. My skin feels soft, smooth, and clean when I get out of the shower. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and doesn't make me break out like almost everything else does. I don't think I'll ever use another scrub!"}, {'date': 'November 19, 2015', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': "... a favor at a bridal shower and I really like it. I like that feels like it's a ... I got this as a favor at a bridal shower and I really like it. I like that feels like it's a finer-milled exfoliating wash (I use Origin's Modern Friction when I want something a little grittier and stronger) so it's gentle enough for me to use in the morning. It doesn't dry out my skin but I do follow it with Boscia's Clear Complexion Tonic & Origin's A Perfect World Moisturizer."}, {'date': 'September 6, 2015', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': "Amazing for Stubbern Dry Skin My mother in law gave me a big bottle of this as a gift. I have dry skin and have tried many exfoliating washes so I wasn't expecting much different.

This stuff is amazing. I use a very small amount for my face and it exfoliates while not irritating the skin so many others did for me. Always gentle.
Ialways feel clean and happy afterwards (:"}, {'date': 'June 28, 2012', 'rating': 2.0, 'text': 'No real results, and not for dry/sensitive skin. Meh, me thinks not. I am in love with Philosophy brand, as they tend to treat my extremely dry and sensitive skin quite well. Whether it's the purity made simple, when hope is not enough, or otherwise, I generally love this line. Well, I went to have a trial makeup session for my wedding done, and the lady suggested I start exfoliating even though I have sensitive skin. I went straight to Philosophy. Well, I've used this stuff about 20x now. The results are always the same. It doesn't feel like I've done anything to my skin, other than it feels slightly smoother for the next five minutes. Then, it promptly goes back to being dry and sensitive. Furthermore, if I use this daily as it's supposedly "gentle enough for daily use," my skin is completely dried out and irritated. Oh, and it burns if you accidentally get it in your eyes, which I haven't had happen with other philosophy products before. Not that I'm splashing it around in my eyes, it just lets me know there are some harsh/not sensitive skin friendly ingredients in here.'}, {'date': 'September 14, 2014', 'rating': 3.0, 'text': "Not worth my money It really doesn't have enough of the micro abrasion stuff in the bottle to do anything for my face. I received packages for trail sometime ago. And I though these wonderful. Really scrub my face and you could feel the difference. Thought this was going to be the same. My Mistake. It's way to mild. Name: Dermalogica Skin Resurfacing Cleanser
Intro: A two-in-one exfoliating cleanser that helps retexturize aging skin to achieve a fresh, smooth surface. Dual-action exfoliating cleanser helps retexturize aging skin. Achieve smooth, ultra-clean skin with this highly-active, two-in-one cleanser and exfoliant. Lactic Acid concentrate helps retexturize skin suffering from visible signs of aging by removing dulling surface debris and helping to accelerate skin cell turnover. Antioxidants condition skin while Rose Flower Oil refreshes the senses. Use daily to dramatically improve skin texture and properly prepare it for maximum penetration of AGE Smart products.
Key_Benefits: Retexturizes, hydrates, and brightens leaving skin super smooth.Convenient two-in-one cleanser and exfoliant.Retexturizes, leaving skin super smooth.Helps accelerate cell turnover, hydrate and brighten.

The one thing you don't know is the age of the product. This skin cleaner was like dried Elmer's glue. 1 ounce for $11.00. That is a shot glass. I really suspect that it was a sample. My bad I didn't study it. Their bad because no one checks outside party vendors' product. Not pleased this year. Connie"}, {'date': 'April 26, 2016', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': 'Very Pleased-- Confident in My Newly Improved Skin I was struggling with adult acne that popped up on my cheeks summer of last year. After 2 weeks of using this product, I notice the acne start to vanish. Within 4 weeks, I noticed the red spots and my skin tone improve greatly. It’s been about 2 months, and my skin looks so healthy. I haven’t had any spots (even small ones) on my cheeks for more than a month. Also, the texture of my skin is incredible smooth after every washing. To begin with, I felt like this product dried out my skin when I used it 2 times a day, but I now use it just the evenings to make sure I thoroughly get off all my makeup and dryness is no longer a problem. Also, there are times with I alternate it with a cheaper more gentler facewash when I know my skin isn’t in need of its magical powers so much. While this product is a little pricey for my modest college student budget, I have found that a little goes a long way. I also just use the product on my acne prone cheeks and skip the rest of the face. I’m barely into the bottle and don’t think I’ll be replacing it for at least another 6 months. Overall, I would highly recommend this product. I feel like my skin condition has improve so much that I now feel pretty comfortable about going bare face when I leave the house and I could credited this change to this resurfacing cleanser.

P.S. I use the Dermalogica mask, too. But I’ve only cracked it open 4 or 5 times since I bough both products because I haven’t even felt like I needed the extra kick a normal mask would offer due to the cleanser packing such a punch.'}, {'date': 'November 18, 2013', 'rating': 5.0, 'text': "Makes A Big Difference I am 34 and I have had problems with my skin since college. I thought I had everything under control with all natural products (I only use things with low-toxicity ratings found on EWG's Skin Deep website). This year my skin began flipping out. I look like a wrinkled, zitty teen. Several months ago I was visiting my parents and my mom had this product. I used it every night for a week and it made a noticeable different. The zits cleared and my face looked smooth and fresh. I initially thought my face cleared because I was eating better, but I used it again the next two times I was visiting and had the same results. My mom even noticed and commented that I need to start buying Dermalogica. I checked it out on the Skin Deep website and found it is a 4 out of 10 on the toxicity scale. Normally I don't buy anything over a 2, but I am willing to make an exception for this cleanser. I am tired of looking old and adolescent at the same time. As a side note, some of Dermalogica's products are extremely toxic. Name: DDF Brightening Cleanser, 6 Fl Oz
Intro: A wash-off cleanser with a blend of brighteners to help even skin tone and smooth skin's texture. A wash-off cleanser with a blend of brighteners to help even skin tone and smooth skin's texture. A blend of six natural skin brighteners in a foaming glycolic and salicylic gel to help noticeably minimize uneven skin tone and target age spots. Excellent for face and body as part of an overall hyperpigmentation program. Also effective in helping minimize post blemish discoloration. Licorice scent.
Key_Benefits: Gently removes dirt from the skin and exfoliates dead skin cells, results in increased skin radiance.

It does have a tingling effect and smells like strong black licorice. I like this-some may not. You don’t need much and you don’t use it every day-only a few times a week. Foremost, do know that the odor takes a little getting used to. At first, I thought I received an expired product. But, after a moment, I realized that it is a blend of medicinal and licorice (which is a really weird pairing for your olfactory system to parse out). So, even after finishing this bottle, I'm still not accustom to the scent and will be switching back to my old cleanser, On The Go Cleanser ( For Normal / Combination Skin ) 207ml/7oz. So awesome!)

Besides the polarizing smell, the product does seem to clean well, rinses with ease, and does provide a mild exfoliating effect (be careful not to overuse it though ... you will experience peeling, especially if you already have a fairly rigorous skin care regimen). Nonetheless, the bottle is a little small for the price. There are comparable premium cleansers that cost considerably less.

For those with sensitivities to scent, this might not be the best choice (then again, it might be better than some of the fruity or flowery scents). It does work well, but for me the price (in comparison to the actual size) and the odor means that I'll be moving on."}]

Name: M61 power cleanse
Intro: This pore refining, exfoliating gel cleanser washes away dirt, makeup, excess oil and other impurities, while removing dead surface cells for a smoother, more improved complexion. Glycolic acid works to deeply clean pores and improve the skin’s tone, texture and clarity, while tea tree extract helps calm and vitamin B5 replenishes moisture.
Key_Ingredients:
Glycolic acid helps to reduce pore size, reduce the appearance of fine lines and improve the skin’s tone, texture and clarity.
Tea tree extract helps improve the look of blemish-prone skin,
Vitamin B5 binds water to the skin, helping to plump and replenish the skin’s moisture level.
Gluten-free & vegan.
Dermatologist & allergy tested.
Paraben & phthalate free.
Synthetic fragrance-free.
Sulfate-free.
Free of synthetic dyes.
No animal testing.
Key_Benefits:
• Washes away dirt, makeup, excess oil and other impurities.
• Exfoliates and smooths skin.
• Removes dead surface cells for an improved complexion.
• Gel consistency.

(I also posted this review under the Hydraboost Jelly Cleanse since the review is for both products.) I have always had issues with finding the proper cleansers for my sensitive/reactive, combination with mild acne skin. Acne cleansers are too harsh, and sensitive skin cleansers are too gentle and moisturizing and often cause even more clogged pores. Enter this wonderful cleanser! I use Hydraboost Jelly Cleanse as my first cleanser, and its gentle properties set the stage for my skin to tolerate a second cleanser with the more powerful Power Cleanse. This combination has helped my skin looked brighter, clearer and more hydrated than it has in years. At 45-years-old, I’ve finally found my go-to cleansers, and I couldn’t be more pleased. To the ladies and gents out there who have skin issues similar to mine, maybe give this combo a try! Everyone’s skin is different, but with inexpensive travel sizes available, you may find this is the perfect one-two punch for you as well. Name: Tatcha The Water Cream: Oil-Free, Optimal Hydration Moisturizer For Pure Poreless Skin - 50 ml | 1.7 oz
Intro:
Provides nutrient-rich, balanced hydration: 
    

            Unique water-burst cream breaks upon application to deeply deliver treatment benefits, hydrating without leaving skin sticky or greasy.
        






        Clarifies and refines skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals:
    

Japanese Wild Rose visibly tightens pores and smoothes skin texture.Japanese Leopard Lily helps control excess oil and clarify skin by encouraging natural skin turnover.






        Delivers anti-aging Japanese superfoods:
    

Hadasei-3, an anti-aging trinity of green tea, rice & algae, restores youthful radiance.Imparts a subtle, shine-free glow with a touch of 23-karat gold.
Key_Benefits:
OIL-FREE: This oil-free, water cream releases a burst of skin-improving Japanese nutrients, powerful botanicals and optimal hydration for pure, poreless skin.



PROVIDES NUTRIENT-RICH, BALANCED HYDRATION: Unique water-burst cream breaks upon application to deeply deliver treatment benefits, hydrating without leaving skin sticky or greasy.



CLARIFIES AND REFINES skin with pure, powerful Japanese botanicals: Japanese Wild Rose visibly tightens pores and smoothes skin texture. Japanese Leopard Lily helps control excess oil and clarify skin by encouraging natural skin turnover.



DELIVERS ANTI-AGING JAPANESE SUPERFOODS: Hadasei-3, an anti-aging trinity of green tea, rice & algae, restores healthy-looking, youthful radiance. Imparts a subtle, shine-free glow with a touch of 23-karat gold.



FORMULATED WITHOUT: Mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, parabens, urea, DEA, TEA or phthalates. Oil-free. Non-comedogenic. Non-irritating. Non-sensitizing. Dermatologist tested. Cruelty-free.

Name: Magic Cream Moisturizer
Intro: An anti-aging moisturizer with hyaluronic acid to visibly plump skin and diminish the look of wrinkles, leaving skin glowing and prepped for flawless makeup. This product started it all. Frustrated by moisturizers that didn't provide a glowing base, Charlotte created her own to transform models' and celebrities' skin in an instant. Magic Cream floods skin with moisture, making it appear plumper and smoother, while transforming the look over time. The light floral fragrance is natural and derived from a blend of Magnolia, Rose, and Camellia oils.
Key_Ingredients: Bionymph Peptide Complex: Diminishes the appearance of wrinkles and improves the look and feel of skin smoothness. Hyaluronic Acid: Moisturizes skin’s outer layers so skin looks and feels softer, smoother, and plumped. Vitamins C and E: Visibly brighten and even skin tone while fighting dullness.
Ideal_for_concern: Fine lines and wrinkles, loss of firmness and elasticity
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal, Dry

I use highly hydrating cream/serum after chemical peeling when my skin gets very dry and patchy. DRUNK ELEPHANT Protini Polypeptide Moisturizer is the best so far. Mixing liquid foundation with Lancer’s skin oil also gave me hydration and natural, dewy look as well. I received CHARLOTTE TILBURY Magic Cream Moisturizer as a sample. I was excited to try because it’s a very expensive cream and receives many good reviews. The first time I tried, I was surprised how greasy it was. Not dewy, but greasy, in my opinion. I used Marc Jacobs Shameless foundation with Marc Jacobs Coconut Primer, but the cream was too greasy and foundation and concealer did not stay beautifully as usual. I also think the hydration level is probably fine for someone with moderately dry skin or in the summer when you don’t need as much product/hydration. Personally I think the best use of this product is for prepping your skin for a full face of makeup and if it was sold solely for that purpose I’d rate it higher (4 stars). My only issue with this product is that I feel it’s pricey for what it is. It reminds me a bit of Pond’s coldcream both in texture and in it’s scent. That said it is a FAR better quality in that Ponds Cold Cream is one of the few products that will give me a breakout and this product kept my skin clear and healthy looking. Name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Day Cream SPF 23
Intro: An anti-aging moisturizer with SPF 23 that hydrates and visibly corrects wrinkles. Featuring the latest technology from Japan, ReNeura Technology+™ improves skin's receptivity while KOMBU-bounce complex serves as a natural wrinkle inner-filler, helping to target the look of current and future wrinkles. The texture absorbs quickly and provides up to 24-hour moisture for smooth, resilient skin.
Key_Ingredients: ReNeura Technology+™: Helps improve skin receptivity to awaken and maintain the effectiveness of your treatment over time.  KOMBU-Bounce Complex: Helps address the causes of wrinkle formation and serves as a natural wrinkle inner-filler. Avobenzone 2%, Homosalate 5%, Octinoxate 7.4%, Octocrylene 3%, and Oxybenzone 1.5%: Sun protection.
Ideal_for_concern: Fine Lines, Wrinkles, and Dryness
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily y

Name: CrÃ¨me de la Mer Moisturizer
Intro: A luxuriously rich cream that thoroughly soothes, moisturizes, and hydrates to help heal away dryness—the La Mer moisturizer that started it all. There’s a La Mer moisturizer for every complexion. Each is infused with cell-supporting Miracle Broth™, the legendary healing elixir, and the powerful antioxidant lime tea, to help protect against stress and pollution. Discover the texture best suited to your skin’s potential. This product is ideal for drier skin.
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness, Redness, Fine lines and wrinkles

It's meant to prevent TEWL (transepidermal water loss) and it's the best for that being used as the final layer in a nightly routine. Otherwise it may be too heavy for many. I mix it with Retin-A in order to combat the dryness that occurs when using Retin-A by itself and to create a milder smooth formula that nourishes by refining. Also make sure you warm the creme up in your fingers first so that its transparent, then gently pat it into your skin, and you'll notice a huge difference.

There are SO many creams here at Sephora or even the drugstore that have amazing long term benefits with much more special ingredients. There's not even hyaluronic acid in this... even though it's nothing special, it's still an amazing humectant that belongs in moisturizers. This cream is personally not worth the money. I started using La Mer a decade ago because I have a much older cousin who looks insanely young and credits her fabulous skin to La Mer. This cream is very think and heavy. I would recommend it if you have severely dry skin, dry and/or irritated patches of skin from the elements or sensitized skin. I would also recommend this for mature skin. A little goes a very very long way. One small jar lasts for years so if you want to try it, start with a sample size. You will have plenty of time to see how you like it and how your skin reacts to it and won’t run the risk of larger sizes becoming expired. For me, this is much too heavy for daytime use and makes my normal to combination acne prone skin look greasy fast. I don’t think it wears nicely under makeup either. So I only use it at night. It’s a nice hydrating moisturizer, don’t get me wrong, but if I’m dropping this kind of money on skincare it’s going to be on a serum and not a moisturizer.

…read more"}, {'date': '4 Oct 2018', 'rating': 5, 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Skin Tone': 'Light', 'text': 'Accutane Creme de la Mer If you're taking Accutane, this will be the single best investment you could make in your skin! Even if you only buy it once to get through the period of taking Accutane and switch to something less expensive when you're done, it is absolutely worth it. Accutane takes care of your acne from the inside (stopping oil production in the skin), but you need something to (1) heal your old scars and damaged skin caused by the numerous harsh topicals you've used prior to starting Accutane, (2) to reduce inflammation, and (3) to provide restorative, long-lasting hydration to your skin (***This last one is really important*** Your skin still needs deep hydration to be healthy, clear, and glowing, but you don't want an "oil free" moisturizer that replaces good oils, which you administer proportionately with each application, with substitutes such as silicone. Silicone, for example, will clog your pores, causing acne and texture, if not thoroughly removed from the skin each night). I'm almost done with Accutane. I've seen 6 dermatologists and had cystic, painful acne for 15 years. I cannot believe I almost have movie start skin, truly. Accutane this moisturizer are no doubt the key. I did not have bad symptoms (no harsh dryness or cracking). I used no serums, concentrates, or other crap. This product really works... if you let it!

I received a two week sample of this and was excited to use based on all of the positive reviews. Then I read the ingredients. WHY does an expensive and allegedly pure product like this have mineral oil and petroleum as the second and third ingredients?? For those who do not know exactly what these are, these compounds help run the engines of your car, lawn mower and other small engine equipment you may own. And you're putting it on your body. It is cheap for cosmetic companies to obtain and since they are so high up on the ingredient list, most of the product is made up of them. For The "heavy duty moisture and protection" that I am seeing in some reviews is because of the barrier it leaves on your skin. And this is why it feels like it is always sitting on your skin. Because it is! Your skin doesn't have the chance to absorb the product you are paying your hard earned money for. Mineral oil gives the feeling of hydration but there is no benefit. There are so many better options out there that actually do the job with more pure and less harmful ingredients. Not meaning to be a Debbie Downer, but we are consumers and need to know what we are putting into out bodies, onto our skin, etc. I hope I have helped at least one person with this review.

I've been eyeing it for years (not an exaggeration) but the price always kept me away. My most recent regimen was by Rodan Fields. Prior to that I had tried products like No. 7, Vichy, and every drugstore brand you can think of. My skin is dehydrated, oily, I have large pores and endless blackheads. A bit of sun damage and "mommy tiredness" round out my look. I have been searching for something that will hydrate my skin, as the few fine lines I have really could benefit from moisture. Anti aging products I've tried have left my skin dry. Enter La Mer. Upon first glance it seems pretentious - the brand has a colorful backstory, and the product contains "miracle broth" and is used by a ton of celebrities. It comes with special application instructions. It seemed foolish. The creme is thick like diaper paste and requires warming between your fingertips to emulsify it, at which point you pat/press the product into your skin. The first two times I tried this I got it wrong and ended up rubbing it in, which I immediately regretted as it's too thick and really you end up pulling on your skin to apply it. But once I got the hang of it, boy I really started to love bedtime. I only use this at night because I think it's too costly to use twice a day, and if I used it in the daytime I would also need a sunscreen product. At night I usually shower, cleanse, tone and La Mer my skin. It feels so luxurious. The next morning my skin looks refreshed and glowing. Best of all, it feels and looks hydrated! The only drawback for me is the price, but I don't believe I should give the product 4 stars based on that, because I do think the product is lovely. And because of it's paste-like texture I have a hard time using less product (to try to spare it along) because I need so much to rub between my fingers to emulsify it. Overall I will continue to use La Mer, but will stick with once a day.

Name: Hydrating Face Cream Moisturizer
Intro: A rich yet lightweight formula that hydrates, moisturizes, conditions, and nourishes skin, and is ideal for layering under makeup.

Ideal_for_skintype: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

I know I’m going to get dehydrated from dancing and drinking, and I like how this keeps my face “in-place” when combined with a primer, while also keeping my skin hydrated through the evening. Some creams don’t allow for makeup on top, or they clog my small pores, magnifying them. This does not! I also enjoy the smell; it doesn’t smell perfumed, but just like I went to a high-end spa. It’s difficult to explain. Overall, I’m still experimenting with many creams and lotions, but I have a feeling this is the one I’ll keep coming back to. I do layer 3-5 products beneath it such as a moisturizing toner, water, and serum, so I’m not sure if it is good after just a wash.

These skincare products are not cheap so I tested and tested until I found the right combination in which to use these that worked best for my skin. Name: Hydraphel Skin Supplement Lotion
Intro: An alcohol-free skin toner that leaves dry skin feeling refreshed.
Key_Benefits: This alcohol-free, nourishing formula gently respects your delicate, dry skin, which can easily become dehydrated. Panthenol reduces redness, while allantoin and vitamin B support natural renewal and repair.

Name: Rose Floral Toner
Intro: A soothing, alcohol-free toner and setting spray that delivers hydration with a heavenly scent.  This cooling mist moisturizes for 24-hours for a healthy, dewy look. The extra-gentle formula for all skin types—even sensitive—is made with pure rosewater, revered since antiquity for its calming benefits. Use it to set makeup and refresh skin throughout the day.
Key_Ingredients: Rosewater
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness, Dullness and Uneven Texture
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily
