Name: Lancome Tonique Confort Re-Hydrating Comforting Toner with Acacia Honey
Intro: A silky, soothing, and moisturizing toner that gently purifies and rehydrates dry and sensitive skin. Made with acacia honey and sweet almond oil for a healthy-looking complexion, this toner soothes and comforts skin. It thoroughly hydrates, allowing for triple usage as a toner, essence, and moisturizer for dry or sensitive skin. Skin is left feeling soft, fresh, clean, and comfortable.
Ideal_for_concern: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture
Ideal_for_skintype: Dry

The consistency of the product is unique and one of its strengths in my opinion—just slightly thicker than a typical toner liquid, but not not as think as a gel or creme; which seems to contribute to a more substantial hydration with more staying power than the water-like consistency of other toners. Additionally, it still dries fairly quickly, so as to not hold up the moisturizer step that will likely follow. A slight drawback of this product for me is the fragrance—both as an ingredient and the actual smell. (I’ll mention that I use primarily simple skincare, so I am typically more accustomed to a milder fragrance.) While I’m personally not particularly fond of a rose scent, this product certainly has notes of that rose fragrance, which seems to be really “in” right now. Name: The Tonic
Intro: A nurturing toner, rich in marine ingredients, to refresh and tone the skin after cleansing and balance the complexion before treatments. This refreshing treatment leaves skin feeling soothed and toned after cleansing. It is crafted with La Mer’s proprietary Deconstructed Waters™ and a blend of marine-rich ingredients, leaving skin feeling nurtured and with a healthy glow.
Ideal_for_concern: Dullness, Uneven Texture, and Dryness
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily

Also, the smell is lovely.'}, {'date': '18 Apr 2020', 'rating': 3, 'Skin Type': 'Combination', 'Skin Tone': 'Tan', 'text': 'Not For Acne Prone Skin So I have been using this for about two weeks and I know that is not enough time to see complete results but I will say this tones skin really well. One thing about La Mer is the concern of synthetic fragrances and dyes. There is less than 1% fragrance in this product which makes me feel better but there is red dye. Although it’s one of the last ingredients on the list, red dye is extremely irritating and can cause you to breakout. I ignored this fact because it was one of the last ingredients, but it did make my cheeks breakout in a way I’ve never seen before. Everyone who has acne prone skin is different, so if you want to try it maybe it’ll work better for you! And if it does break you out just switch toners and it’ll heal. Overall it’s an okay toner, but be careful if you’re acne prone. Another downside is the packaging, it’s literally cheap plastic- it looks nice but does not give you that luxury feeling that you’d expect from this brand. SK-II toner is cheaper than this and it’s solid glass, just saying.

Name: Facial Treatment Clear Lotion Toner
Intro: A hydrating toner to complete your cleansing ritual. This bestselling toner helps remove stubborn impurities to reveal your skin's true radiance and prepare it for the rest of your regimen. It is crafted with a mix of AHA and pitera—a bio-ingredient rich in vitamins, organic acids, minerals, and amino acids—that work together to support natural skin cell renewal. The alcohol-free formula gently exfoliates while both hydrating and closing pores.
Ideal_for_concern: Pores, Dullness and uneven texture, Uneven skin tone
Ideal_for_skintype: Normal, Dry, Combination, Sensitive, and Oily

I've used this toner and the FTE since December 2018. I'm trying other serums - I won't leave this toner. The product is watery and light, but does everything it says it will. My pores appear smaller and it REALLY took the redness out of my face. It cuts my chemical exfoliators well when necessary. My skin drinks it up! And it's not heavy nor alcohol-based; it's VERY gentle on the skin. I don't know what to say except that I love this stuff and worship at its altar. Almost all my other products rotate and change - SK-II's Facial Treatment Clear Lotion is forever.

I immediately appreciated how much product comes out with just a couple of shakes onto a cotton ball. Next, I appreciated how there is no scent, burning, or other sensation when applying. With this, you wipe it on and it absorbs quickly with no residue or stickiness after applying. After using it for a few weeks, I can say that I really like the results. You don’t realize it is doing anything because it is so simple going on and so subtle in how it works. I notice that my skin is a lot calmer since I first started using it. My skin seems less blotchy, smoother, more radiant. Again, it is very subtle in how it works, but one day the difference is noticeable. I didn’t realize how much of a difference it was making until today when I was eating at an outdoor café and someone I hadn’t seen in a while walked by. The clear liquid makes it non-greasy and very good for Texas summers. in the winter time, I don't have a problem with it being over drying. I find it smoothing to my irradiated skin when I am on my retina A routine. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to clean their skin completely. Name: AUGUSTINUS BADER the cream
Intro: Refresh the complexion and show off a more radiant look with the Augustinus Bader The Cream, a skincare treatment that can help to minimise the various signs of ageing.This lightweight formula delivers a nourishing dose of hydration to the skin and encourages a brighter, more contoured look. It is powered by an effective blend of calming aloe vera, amino acids and antioxidants, which help to protect the skin from free radical damage. A combination of vitamins A, B, C and E support healthy skin function, soothe irritation and promote a plumper look.Augustinus Bader The Cream can be used each morning as part of a daily skincare ritual. Simply massage two pumps onto clean, dry skin around the face, neck and chest.
Key_Ingredients: AQUA (WATER), CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, HYDROGENATED PHOSPHATIDYLCHOLINE, GLYCERIN, SORBITOL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, XANTHAN GUM, PANTHENOL, SODIUM CARBOMER, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF JUICE, RETINYL PALMITATE, HYDROLYZED RICE PROTEIN, SQUALANE, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, PHENOXYETHANOL, ASCORBYL PALMITATE, LECITHIN, ALCOHOL, CARBOMER, CERAMIDE NP, TFC-8, SODIUM BENZOATE, GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) PROTEIN, SUPEROXIDE DISMUTASE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, DEXTRAN, PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-8, ASCORBIC ACID, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, TOCOPHEROL, POTASSIUM SORBATE, SODIUM DEXTRAN SULFATE.
Key_Benefits: A moisturising cream with anti-ageing benefits Works to improve the overall look of the complexion Enriched with nourishing argan and avocado oils Only a small amount is needed for each application Ideal for combination and oily skin types

[{'date': '4 days ago', 'rating': 5, 'text': 'A GAME CHANGER I finally found the perfect cream. Pores are gone, fine lines, everything! You need a very small amount every time. I am so impressed. Name: Nutrient Toner
Intro: A balancing toner to help combat breakouts and blemishes. Helps regulate oily skin while leaving it feeling ultra-nourished. Naturally scented with sandalwood, helichrysum, and cypress to invigorate the senses.
Key_Ingredients:
BLACK WILLOW BARK EXTRACT: 
Meet the original salicylic acid, straight from nature herself. Unlike its less expensive, synthetically derived counterpart, it exfoliates skin without irritation or sensitivity.


OLIVE LEAF EXTRACT: 
This bacteria-busting extract also provides the anti-inflammatory properties that troubled, blemish-prone skin craves. Antioxidant powers give it the added benefit of preventing the free radical damage that causes wrinkles.


SANDALWOOD HYDROSOL: 
This powerful antimicrobial is sustainably sourced exclusively from the dead wood of 30-plus-year-old Hawaiian sandalwood trees and worth every penny. Besides being rich in astringent and disinfecting properties that fend off acne-causing bacteria, it regenerates skin cells.
Key_Benefits: Unlike many other toners which are astringent and stripping, our Clear Nutrient Toner is decidedly non-drying to help restore your skin to its natural brilliance. Sandalwood hydrosol, sustainably sourced from Hawaii, is a potent natural disinfectant that imparts a lasting glow. Olive leaf extract provides the soothing properties that blemish-prone skin craves.
Ideal_for_skintype: Oily and Combination Skin Types

Name: Absolue Revitalizing & Brightening Soft Cream
Intro:
WHAT IT IS	
A soft cream facial moisturizer with a unique, transforming texture that visibly reduces fine lines and wrinkles, while rejuvenating skin with firmness, radiance and 24-hour hydration.
						

WHAT ELSE YOU NEED TO KNOW		
Made with an exclusive blend of Grand Rose Extracts, this indulgent cream visibly revitalizes skin with moisture, firmness and plumpness. Its unique texture creates a sensorial journey as it transforms ‒ from a thick hydrating cream, to a thin serum-like lotion, to a thick layer plumping skin with moisture. Wrinkles and fine lines appear diminished for younger-looking, smooth skin that is brighter, radiant, toned and more even. Skin surface cell renewal is improved and skin's moisture barrier is protected.
Refill capsule available.
Read this editor's review on the Absolue Soft Cream.
Key_Ingredients: 1 -  Grand Rose Extracts (Lancôme Rose Extract, Rose Essential Oil and Rose Concentrate)		 2 - Essential Oils (Meadowfoam Seed, Apricot, Passion Fruit, Rice Bran) & Shea Butter		 3 - Pro-Xylane™
Key_Benefits:
Made with an exclusive blend of Grand Rose Extracts, this indulgent cream visibly revitalizes skin with moisture, firmness and plumpness. Its unique texture creates a sensorial journey as it transforms‒ from a thick hydrating cream, to a thin serum-like lotion, to a thick layer plumping skin with moisture. Wrinkles and fine lines appear diminished for smoother, younger-looking skin as well as a brighter, more radiant and even skin tone. Skin surface cell renewal is improved and skin's moisture barrier is protected.                 

Instantly*:        
 • Skin feels soothed and comfortable 
• Skin looks smoother and less fatigued/less tired                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         • Skin seems softer and nurtured               
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
After one week*:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
• Skin looks revitalized, clearer and more beautiful 
• Skin feels protected and plumper                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     • Skin texture appears refined                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
• Skin tone appears more radiant and more even

Name: Soft Clean Silky Hydrating Lotion
Intro: Gentle toning lotion cushions your skin, leaving it feeling soft, supple, luxuriously hydrated. Primes skin to achieve maximum results from the skincare that follows. Includes soothing extracts of Passion Flower and Edelweiss.
Key_Ingredients:
Ingredients 


          Ingredients: Water\Aqua\Eau; Bis-Peg-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane; Polysorbate 20; Leontopodium Alpinum Extract; Passiflora Incarnata Flower Extract; Lythrum Salicaria Extract; Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Extract; Hordeum Vulgare (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge; Sucrose; Caffeine; Cholesterol; Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate; Sodium Hyaluronate; Phospholipids; Ethylhexylglycerin; Sodium Pca; Trehalose; Linoleic Acid; Urea; Glycerin; Butylene Glycol; Petrolatum; Squalane; Polyphosphorylcholine Glycol Acrylate; Polyquaternium-51; Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer; Tromethamine; Fragrance (Parfum); Disodium Edta; Phenoxyethanol 

<ILN37467>
Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
Key_Benefits:
BENEFITS
Hydrating toner. Leaves skin soft, supple.
Ideal_for_skintype: For Dry skin
